title: The Buzz Is Back in Charlotte | Group Chat
description:
We are joined by CBS Sports writer James Herbert to discuss the Hornets’ solid start to the season behind LaMelo Ball, Gordon Hayward, and wacky small-ball lineups. Later, the guys talk about CJ McCollum, Jerami Grant, and the NBA’s COVID-19 problem in another edition of Show and Take (46:00).
Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks
Guest: James Herbert
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
